name: places/ChIJ1ZYCpWL2wokRKqQD2gZZ6vg
adrFormatAddress: 3610 Broadway #1n, New York, NY 10031-3212, USA

originalText.text: Staff and Doctors are very professional, diligent and kind. If you do not want painful, high quality dental treatments, this is right place to be. I have referred all my family to them. I would like them to be close to my house since I have to commute from Queens Jamaica to uptown Manhattan. So Manhattan community is blessed to have them.

originalText.text:
Dr. Grecy and her staff are so great! and very customer oriented. They listen and are very deligent by treating their customer with world class customer service.
Thanks! all of you.

originalText.text: went in there for a cleaning and filling it’s was cool until after i looked in my mouth and saw a huge hole nowhere near my tooth and they said it’ll heal i’ll be okay … it’s not that clean in there and they said i have more cavities a few months after i just got them filled IN THE SAME SPOT . don’t recommend. they don’t even tell you what’s going on as they’re doing what they’re doing . hope you speak spanish too

originalText.text:
They did a HORRIBLE job with my teeth. I hadn't gone to this place in years because I hated their work in the past but when I saw their ratings got better, I gave them a chance. I spent SO MUCH MONEY getting my teeth repaired and the gentlemen that prepared my teeth told me that they could fix any issues i might have with them until I'm satisfied. So when the time came and when I told them I wasn't completely happy with how they looked, I was told "well you shouldn't have gotten into an accident"....

I cried when I got home. They did make me another appointment but I couldn't go because of the anxiety I felt about whether they'd actually fix my teeth or not. It took me a while to write a review because I was so in my feelings that I started to feel like nothing mattered. I became extremely depressed because my accident was part of a series of bad events that were happening to me at that time.

That woman treated me like I intentionally busted my own teeth and then acted like my payment of 1,300 wasn't green enough for her and as if I insulted them by not being completely satisfied... I have to look at these ugly teeth every day and while some days I'm numb to it, others hit me hard and it has affected my self image in such a bad way that I barely look at myself in the mirror.

The only positive I give them is that at least the teeth look like teeth.. but when I show people my problem with them, they 100% see my issue. I hate what happened to me but I completely regret going to these people.

originalText.text:
Once again, I want to Thank Healthy Smiles for their excellent service. The visit July 19 2023 was so  so amazing!!!
Took care all my needs for my teeth, was very gentle welcoming so knowledgeable of her work and made sure I was comfortable and feeling okay while she do her work. Best dentist visit I have ever had!! No pain or discomfort. The business is always pleasant & clean! Great customer service from the entire staff! Appreciate you all. Thank you.
